name: Vaadin.RadioButtonElement

properties.name: autofocus
properties.description: Specify that this control should have input focus when the page loads.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If true, the user cannot interact with this element.

properties.name: checked
properties.description: True if the radio button is checked.

description:
`<vaadin-radio-button>` is a Polymer element for radio buttons.

```html
<vaadin-radio-button value="foo">Foo</vaadin-radio-button>
```

### Styling

The following shadow DOM parts are available for styling:

Part name         | Description
------------------|----------------
`radio`           | The radio button element
`label`           | The label content element

The following state attributes are available for styling:

Attribute  | Description | Part name
-----------|-------------|------------
`disabled`   | Set when the radio button is disabled. | :host
`focus-ring` | Set when the radio button is focused using the keyboard. | :host
`focused`    | Set when the radio button is focused. | :host
`checked`    | Set when the radio button is checked. | :host

See [ThemableMixin â€“ how to apply styles for shadow parts](https://github.com/vaadin/vaadin-themable-mixin/wiki)
